title: Global energy game
creator_credit: Paul Galan, Michael Joseloff and Gateway Film Productions
brief_description: Economic journalist Adam Smith hosts a group of six players each representing a different country as they play a simulated game of international oil and global energy. Covers the trade balance and inflation in terms of oil costs and American dependence on foreign oil.
